## ‚úÖ Quality Checklist

### Content Quality
- [ ] **No important content deleted** (only refined, reorganized, or extended)
- [ ] All checklist items use `- [ ]` checkbox format
- [ ] Items written in **imperative mood** (do this, not "should do")
- [ ] Long items split into clear, scannable sub-items
- [ ] Appropriate markers added (‚ö†Ô∏è REQUIRED, ‚≠ê PREFERRED, ‚úÖ benefits)
- [ ] Context/explanations provided where needed

### Structure & Style
- [ ] Items placed in correct section (see CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] Consistent formatting with existing content
- [ ] Code examples use proper language tags (```yaml, ```bash, etc.)
- [ ] Markdown renders correctly (checked preview)
- [ ] Acronyms spelled out on first use (where helpful)
- [ ] Links tested and working

### Technical Accuracy
- [ ] Information is current and reflects 2024-2025 best practices
- [ ] Code examples tested and working
- [ ] Tool/technology versions specified where relevant
- [ ] Recommendations are practical and widely applicable
